title: Breakingviews - The Exchange: White House hopeful Tom Steyer
text:

description: (Reuters Breakingviews) - The hedge fund founder has already spent millions to impeach Donald Trump. He’s now trying to replace the U.S. president, joining a crowded Democratic field. The Exchange went to his campaign office to discuss why he is running and what he thinks of businessmen as politicians.
